markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Catch the Details](/Feats.aspx?ID=2805) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you. You are trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) and gain the [Eye for Numbers](/Feats.aspx?ID=2127) skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.
name: Catch the Details
